key.name: show-icon
key.summary: Show gSnap icon on a panel.

key.name: show-tabs
key.summary: Show tabs for windows in each zone.

key.name: global-presets
key.summary: Keyboard presets are always active (as opposed active only when tiling window is visible).

key.name: moveresize-enabled
key.summary: Enables shortcuts for moving and resizing the current window.

key.name: window-margin
key.summary: Gaps between windows in the middle of screen

key.name: insets-primary-left
key.summary: Left gap around border of screen for primary monitor

key.name: insets-primary-right
key.summary: Right gap around border of screen for primary monitor

key.name: insets-primary-top
key.summary: Top gap around border of screen for primary monitor

key.name: insets-primary-bottom
key.summary: Bottom gap around border of screen for primary monitor

key.name: insets-secondary-left
key.summary: Left gap around border of screen for secondary monitor

key.name: insets-secondary-right
key.summary: Right gap around border of screen for secondary monitor

key.name: insets-secondary-top
key.summary: Top gap around border of screen for secondary monitor

key.name: insets-secondary-bottom
key.summary: Bottom gap around border of screen for secondary monitor

key.name: debug
key.summary: Put debug lines into global.log. To see, run journalctl /usr/bin/gnome-shell -f in terminal
